name: Fortnite Style | Fort Sketcher | LoRA
description:
This model, set to assist you in generating Fortnite-styled characters, has been trained on top quality in-game screenshots.

I STRONGLY RECOMMEND READING ALL THE INFORMATION PROVIDED BELOW IN ITS ENTIRETY

Recommended Resolution: 768x768

Recommended Model: Meina Mix v9

Recommended Negative: Easy Negative, BadhandV4

Recommended Weight: 0.7 - 1.0

Trigger words:

(the most important words are underlined)

fortnite (I recommend using these word in every prompt), portrait, full body shot, 1girl, 1boy, male, male focus, female, navel, woman, ninja mask, from behind, side view, blue background

Useful keywords that might help improve your art: (cycles render:1.3), caustics, (glossy:0.58), (artstation:0.82), unreal engine, pupil (when a character has eye problems)
